tag_list: digital-strategy, digital-innovation, customer-experience, digital-solutions, mobile-commerce, mobile-strategy, digital-convergence, customer-engagement, product-development, product-innovation, intrapreneurship, entrepreneurship, interactive-tv, start-up
overview:
Dougal is a Digital Strategist and Customer Experience expert, who has spent the last 15 years leading the creation of digital products for Finance, IT, and Media businesses.

During this time, he’s set up his own digital consultancy, turned around small businesses, and co-founded a variety of ventures. He has consulted extensively to Big Business and Small Startup – he knows the ‘difference that makes a difference’ in digital.

He is currently co-founder of GetViable and is changing how startups are built.

An Aussie-based Brit, globally roaming, with a passion for anything that’ll put an adrenalin-fuelled smile on your face.
